amendment.description: To increase appropriations for emergency management performance grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4594 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4594 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S7470-7472) To increase appropriations for emergency management performance grants.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4594 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Voinovich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4594 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
